WorkItem.Description:
Hide All Toolbar buttons except the "html" button when entering HTML Source view (via clicking "html" button or executing jHtmlArea.showHTMLView). When toggling view back to the WYSIWYG editor all other buttons will then be shown again.
Â 
This needs to be implemented because when in HTML Source View, the other toolbar buttons do not work.
WorkItem.Summary: Hide All Toolbar buttons except the "html" button when entering HTML Source view
